+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8336320
+ * @summary NullPointerException: Cannot invoke Type.getTag because type is null after JDK-8334037
+ * @compile MrefDoubleTrans.java
+ */
+class MrefDoubleTrans {
+    static class T {
+        public void f() {
+            Runnable r = new I()::m;
+        }
+
+        static class I {
+            void m(Object... xs) {}
+        }
+    }
+}
